item.description:
We will meet in the Bretton Woods Cross Country Skiing Ticket Office.

 

Mount Washington Resort

  • Route 302, Bretton Woods, New Hampshire 03575

Please note that tickets are $17.00

We will start skiing at 10:00 A.M.  Please get there early and get your ticket so that we can start on time.

Bretton Woods is a premier cross country skiing area.  Beautiful trails and beautiful views.

We'll plan on skiing until we drop
item.how_to_find_us: We will meet in the Bretton Woods Cross Country Skiing Ticket Office
item.name: CROSS COUNTRY SKIING BRETTON WOODS
